isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Thermostatic Expansion Valve (TXV) System, March 2007 and Later - SYSTEM OPERATION - TEMPERATURE CONTROL

svcproc.title: TEMPERATURE CONTROL
svcproc.para: This control regulates the temperature of the air discharged from the vents. The blue area of the control indicates cooler temperatures while the red area indicates warmer temperatures. This control operates the blend door that determines what portion of the air flowing through the system is deflected through the heater core. As the temperature control is rotated clockwise more air is deflected through the heater core, increasing the temperature of the air entering the cab.
